properties.site-address: Banbury Road, Oxford, (Banbury Road University Sites)
properties.ownership: not owned by a public authority
properties.notes: Many of the existing buildings on the site contribute to the character of the North Oxford Victorian Suburb Conservation Area or are listed. Therefore any major redevelopment is unlikely to be suitable but there is some potential to intensify existing uses.. This site is allocated for mixed use development (including student accommodation and university staff housing) in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF.

properties.site-address: Blackbird Leys District Centre, Blackbird Leys Road, Oxford, (Blackbird Leys Central Area)

properties.ownership: not owned by a public authority

The site is in a sensitive location within the Jericho Conservation Area and adjacent to the Grade I listed St. Barnabas Church.  The site is allocated in the emerging Local Plan 2036, which is currently undergoing an examination in public (consultation on proposed modifications following hearings).

properties.site-address: Churchill Hospital and Ambulance Resource Centre, Oxford
properties.ownership: owned by a public authority
properties.notes: In November 2019, the Council's East Area Planning Committee resolved to grant planning permission (19/01039/FUL), subject to the signing of a legal agreement, for the demolition of existing buildings, and the construction of key worker housing (19 cluster units) and associated works (additional/revised information). The site is allocated in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013. The allocation also remains in the emerging Local Plan 2036, which is currently undergoing an examination in public (consultation on proposed modifications following hearings). Key worker housing linked to the hospital is identified as a suitable use. General housing and student accommodation are identified as acceptable complementary uses.  Hospital operations would need to be maintained.
